channel.title: Help Making Restarter
channel.description: Everybody tries to give me a voule restarter. I CANNOT use that program. I exits out of all programs running on my comp. Does anybody have a .bat type restarter thas has either a pre-set time or a time set option when booting it up??

item.title: Help Making Restarter
item.dc:creator: @i_317_i_u_i i 317 i u i
item.description:
@i_317_i_u_i wrote:

hello i read your post.

I HOPE U NO HOW TO MAKE A .BAT FILE

Create a file called

voule.bat

edit the file

@echo off cls echo Voule Auto restart tskill java /a echo Restarting server title Ddsspeced "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server cls

Read full topic
